name: Zlick Paywall
author: Zlick

sections.description:
OVERVIEW

Easily monetize your content and sell subscriptions like a pro – the all-in-one paywall plugin with no upfront costs.

Zlick is for you if you want:
1. An easy-to-install paywall with no bloat that you can configure and put live in 10 minutes. No developers needed.
2. Industry leading UX and paywall conversion rates that will skyrocket your paying subscriptions.
3. A flexible and scalable pricing model that doesn’t have upfront or monthly costs. We only get paid when you do, so we’re fully committed to your success.
4. The best possible experience for your customers from a paywall that automatically matches your branding and image.
5. A paywall that can’t be bypassed by readers but keeps its SEO value by still being visible to search engines.
6. Seamless one-click payments and support for Stripe, Apple Pay and Google Pay.
7. An easy-to-use admin panel with CRM tools, analytics and more.

Try our [Live Demo] (https://demo.zlick.it/) and see how it works!

Loved by our clients for its ease of use

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Easiest and best working plugin I have used so far
When I wanted to find a paywall for my blog I really got frustrated with different plugins, managed to get them to work, but they were difficult to use and always something went wrong. I was recommended to use Zlick Paywall and as I am no IT-genius it was easy to install even for me, works perfectly and the support team is always willing to help and answers all questions professionally and very quickly. Would recommend it to everyone who is looking for a paywall.
[Eveliis] (https://wordpress.org/support/topic/easiest-and-best-working-plugin-i-have-used-so-far/)

OUR PROMISES

  1. We help you grow
  2. We commit to best UX and conversion rates
  3. We listen to you and develop what you really need

We scale with you (start for free)

Join the ranks of successful businesses and skyrocket your growth with Zlick’s unique performance-based pricing model. We’re fully invested in your success, so our commission-based model means we only get paid when you do. And we’re here to help every step of the way, with expert guidance on how to maximize your content monetization.

Get started with our free starter plan and enjoy access to powerful marketing tools that will take your engagement and growth to new heights. And as your business grows, so will we! Our advanced reports and features will help you continuously monetize your content and reach new milestones.

With just a small transaction fee of 5% (plus Stripe fees), you’ll be well on your way to scaling your business to new heights. Let’s do this together and watch your success soar!

Clean Nordic design with the ultimate ease of use

Unlock the full potential of your content monetization with our sleek, user-friendly portal. Impress your readers with a clean and modern paywall design that’s a breeze to navigate, featuring a simple choice of one-time payment or subscription, and requires minimal essential information from the customer.

We’ve done the hard work for you, conducting hundreds of A/B tests to ensure our paywall design minimizes bounce rates and delivers the best possible user experience. And with the ability to customize the paywall to match your brand, you’ll stand out from the crowd.

Always improving based on user feedback

Join a community of forward-thinking professionals and shape the future of Zlick with your feedback. We listen to our users and bring the most requested features to life, so you can focus on growing your business without any distractions.

FEATURES

Unlock the full potential of your content with Zlick – the ultimate paywall and subscription plugin for WordPress. With our advanced features, you can easily monetize your content and grow your business.

  • Customizable paywall for one-time payments and recurring subscriptions.
  • Customers can pay for content without signing up. Password free login afterward.
  • Use bulk or single edit tools to restrict access to any content.
  • Payment options – Zlick supports all popular currencies with credit and debit cards (via Stripe), Apple Pay, Google pay, and mobile payments.
  • Connected CRM to manage your customers and their subscriptions in one portal.
  • Advanced analytics – track business metrics, article conversion rate, and user behavior to make data-driven decisions.
  • Hard paywall optimized for search engines – paywalled content can easily be indexed by search engines.
  • Easy installation – 10-minute setup with Stripe and WordPress. No developers needed.
  • Mobile-friendly – Zlick is compatible with all desktop and mobile devices, ensuring a seamless experience for your readers.
  • Monetization and growth consulting – get expert guidance on monetization best practices and growth strategies from our team for free.
  • Unleash your full growth potential with Zlick’s scalable pricing model – no fixed fees for up to 5000 monthly active subscriptions.

Upgrade your content monetization game with Zlick. Try it now for free!

TECHNICAL

The plugin requires the use of Zlick Paywall SDK to load the payment widget on your page and lock content. It automatically adds Zlick Paywall javascript SDK to the page where content is locked. All user and subscription data is stored and is accessible in Zlick Paywall portal. Payments are handled through Stripe. Installing the plugin means you agree with our Terms and Conditions as well as Stripe’s terms of service.

INSTALLATION

It takes 10 minutes to integrate Zlick with your WordPress page. Here’s how you do it:

  1. Open portal.zlickpaywall.com and sign up for a new account.
  2. Log in to your WordPress admin panel.
  3. Navigate to Plugins and click the “Add new” plugin.
  4. Search for “Zlick Paywall” from the marketplace and install & activate it.
  5. Zlick Paywall plugin appears on the left-hand menu under “Settings”.
  6. Open to the Integration panel in Zlick Portal.
  7. Copy & paste your Publisher ID and API Key from the Zlick Portal Integration page to WordPress and enable the plugin.
  8. Connect Stripe to Zlick from Zlick Portal. It’s under Integrations page in Settings.
  9. Create a Stripe account. It takes 3 minutes to finsih this and connect it to your Zlick account.
  10. Open Monetization Plans in Zlick portal and set up your pricing.
  11. Switch Live Payments Mode on in Portal.
  12. Well done. Your Zlick Paywall is connected and ready to accept payments.

You can now hide any article behind a paywall from your WordPress admin panel:
a) Zlick Paywall tickbox is at the bottom of your Edit post / Create a Post view.
b) You can bulk edit the status of a page (Paid/Free) from the post/page list page.

See our more thorough step-by-step guide with visuals.
sections.faq:
What can I do with the free version of the plugin?

The free version has everything to sell subscriptions and single articles. We are charging a monthly fee for extra tools only.

When and how do I get paid?

Payouts will be automatically sent to your bank account daily. If you prefer another schedule for payouts, get in touch with us.

What types of payment does Zlick accept?

We accept all major credit and debit cards, Apple Pay and Google Pay via our payment partner Stripe. We also accept mobile payments in selected countries.

Is the Zlick widget available in languages other than English?

Yes, we support multiple languages. You can change the widget language in the “settings” area in the Zlick portal. If you don’t see your language, get in touch and we will add it 🙂

Will Zlick paywall have a negative effect on SEO and content ranking?

No, all major search engines have access to your content and your content can be indexed by them. You can disable this access manually if you wish.

Does Zlick have an affiliate program?

If you are interested in promoting Zlick and earning a commission from this, please reach out to us and we will set you up.

What name will appear on a customer’s credit card statement?

By default, your website address will appear on the bank statement. If you need a custom message, get in touch with us.
sections.changelog:
2.4.0

  • Opens up content for search engine bots

2.8.0

  • Adds support for bulk actions to enable or disable monetization on multiple articles at once.

2.8.1

  • Adds error logging and alerts.

2.8.2

  • json issue resolution

2.9.0

  • Adds paywall to pages

2.9.1

  • Fix error logging.

2.9.2

  • Adds overlay new style

2.9.3

  • Overlay fix and remove comments for post sharing

3.0.0

  • Disable Ads for subscribers

3.1.0

  • Supports monthly, weekly, yearly pricing
  • Supports multiple plan options for a content

3.2.0

  • Supports Category based Multiple Price Plans.
  • Supports Orthodox price Plan
  • Supports Elementor.

3.2.4

  • Minor refactors.
sections.screenshots:
1. Zlick Paywall Portal with everything you need to sell subscriptions and monetize content.

  2. Customize anything from your brand colors, texts to prices.

  3. Connecting with WordPress & Stripe takes 5 minutes.

  4. Paywall widget look has been A/B tested to minimize drop-off
sections.reviews:
Zlick : enfin un très bon paywall !

By fundance on December 12, 2023

On me l’avait fortement conseillé et je n’ai pas été déçu. Bien au contraire. Le paywall Zlick cumule plusieurs avantages: il est robuste, performant tout en restant simple à mettre en place. Pour l’instant aucun bugs contrairement à d’autres. Et aussi pas de paiement mensuel exorbitant, juste un % raisonnable sur les ventes. Parfois on se laisse aller à souhaiter plus de fonctionnalités, plus d’outils CRM etc… ou un plus vaste choix de formules de souscriptions, mais la simplicité est de mise avec Zlick et elle est volontaire. A l’usage elle est préférable à une « usine à gaz » compliquée. Je mets 5 étoiles méritées.

A good interaction

By gay45eu on October 3, 2023

The engagement with Mr. Jaan Sacks, the Chief Executive Officer of Zlick, proved highly beneficial and yielded valuable insights. Furthermore, it is imperative to emphasize the commendable utilization of inclusive language and the warm reception extended towards the LGBT+ community, a salient aspect to be noted given GAY45.eu's status as a journal dedicated to queer issues. I advise for a video meeting with him. Will worth the time.

A message for Wordpress

By rossonero2021 on May 18, 2023

A messaggi to Wordpress: Jan Saaks, CEO of Zlick, emailed me that the actual version of the plugin (3.0.1) is tested with Wordpress 6.2.1 but your description says that is tested until 6.0.4
Who's saying the truth?

Amazing Plug-in

By koladefowora on May 3, 2023

As a website owner, I have found it to be an incredibly valuable tool for monetizing my content and growing my business.

Since implementing Zlick Paywall, I have seen a significant increase in revenue from my website. The plug-in is user-friendly and easy to customize, allowing me to offer a range of subscription options to my users. I appreciate that I have full control over the content that is placed behind the paywall, which has enabled me to offer exclusive content to my subscribers and keep my free content accessible to everyone.

One of the things that I appreciate most about Zlick is the level of support that they offer. Whenever I have had a question or needed assistance with something, the team has been incredibly responsive and helpful.

Overall, I would highly recommend Zlick paywall plug-in to any website owner who is looking for a reliable, effective way to monetize their content. It has truly been a game-changer for my business, and I am grateful for the work that you do.

Thank you for creating such a fantastic product.

Wale Fowora

mrfowora.com

THE Best paywall plugin by far!

By edwardellis on April 4, 2023

I wanted a simple Wordpress plugin for my content website that allowed me to put pages and posts behind a paywall. I literally trialled every option there is, Leaky Paywall, Memberpress, Memberful...etc and Zlick is by a country mile the best option.

But it would be unfair to even compare Zlick Paywall to them, it's so far ahead. The other options I mentioned are stuck in 2005 with their designs, limitations and frankly the payment flows and multiple screens needed for a visitor to just purchase a membership are laughable in this day and age.

I'm able to create websites and am quite 'literate' with web design, but just trying to create a membership area was so confusing with the other options. And you have to create an extra 2-3 pages on your website and make sure they look good, the links work...etc.

Why is Zlick better?

  • Clean design and UX - miles better than any other option.
  • Users can purchase with 1-click! Less friction than visiting multiple pages so this means more conversions.
  • Super simple setup, takes 10-15mins at the most.
  • Allows recurring memberships.
  • Is reasonably priced with a percentage fee structure of commissions, unlike Leaky Paywall asking for $299 per month.
  • Regularly updated
  • The development team really cares! They literally took on board feedback I gave and updated the plugin with that exact feature.

Just simply a great plugin which does exactly what you want!

Easiest and best working plugin I have used so far

By eveliis on August 16, 2022

When I wanted to find a paywall for my blog I really got frustrated with different plugins, managed to get them to work, but they were difficult to use and always something went wrong. I was recommended to yose Zlick Paywall and as I am no IT-genius it was easy to install even for me, works perfectly and the support team is always willing to help and answers all questions professionaly and very quickly. Would recommend it to everyone who is looking for a paywall.

Great plugin

By Jos? Bandos (josebandos) on June 1, 2021

The simplest and easiest to use plugin I've found so far. Quick installation, 10 minutes. The support is very good and they respond quickly and objectively. Need to have more monetization plans options. Without a doubt very good. I recommend it to everyone.

Great for a blog

By bucksy on April 30, 2021

Looks really good on the website and is easy to setup. Using it on one of our clients blog and they love it. Nice backend ui to manage customers and the plugin. Client has earned over 1k euros from subscriptions already.

One word: simple

By jeanpierre94 on March 25, 2021

I got super frustrated of trying to find and install paywalls for my fashion blog for a few weeks - everytime I would start an installation, something would go wrong or I wouldn't understand the instructions, not being a super tech person. With this plugin I managed to understand all instructions and get my paywall working in like 15-20 minutes. Super happy (so far) of the product!

Easy to use, took 11 min to set up.

By Siim (sbpukk) on April 13, 2021

It's well designed and fits perfectly to my site with a clean design. Cool that I can customize it to fit with the color scheme of my site (meadow green and charcoal). And setting it up took me 11 minutes with stripe account creation. Not all mentioned features are included already but the core functionality works neatly. Can lock content and take payments (tested), can see subscribers in CRM, can send automated welcome emails. Didn't see analytics but I assume they'll add analytics soon? Edit: they have analytics now too. 100% Recommend it

short_description: Sell subscriptions and one-off access to your content with industry-leading conversion rates, a simple platform to operate, and no upfront costs.
